short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open your Localhost & Phpmyadmin by 1 click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPDATE : I made a new app which do the same and more : QUICK LAUNCH'EM app !

Allows developers to save shortcuts localhost and phpmyadmin related to their current project to be accessed by one click. Just right click on the icon and set options for your preferences ! Enjoy ;)
